month.description: Ranpli formiler anba la baze lor bann valer ki afise lor ou peyslip, otan ki posib.

isResident.label: Eski ou enn rezidan lil moris?

isPublicSector.label: Eski ou travay dan sekter piblik?

isInDomesticService.label: Eski ou travay dan sekter domestik?

chargeableIncome.subtitle: Reveni taksab (montan ki servi pou kalkil ou taks PAYE)

incomeDescription.travelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor (montan ki ou anplwayer pey ou)
incomeDescription.maxNonTaxableTravelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor maximal non taksab = 25% x Saler debaz (ziska {{maxAllowance}})
incomeDescription.taxableTravelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor taksab (aplikab si konpansasion transpor depas konpansasion transpor maximal non taksab)

paye.subtitle: PAYE (sif arondi) faktire par MRA (afise lor peyslip)
paye.calculationSteps:
• Si reveni taksab restan pli tigit ki limit taksab, reveni taksab restan servi kouma montan taksab
  • sinon, limit taksab servi kouma montan taksab ek nou retir limit taksab depi dan reveni taksab restan pou prosin kalkil

csg.subtitle: CSG (sif arondi) faktire par MRA (afise lor peyslip)

nsf.subtitle: NSF (sif arondi) faktire par MRA (afise lor peyslip)
nsf.nsfInsurableSalaryExplanation: NSF kalkile lor saler debaz. Selman, zis enn parti saler debaz servi dan kalkil la, i.e. <Link>enn minimum ek enn maximum fixe par MRA</Link> (paz 9).

year.description: Pu tou depans ki ou finn fer an parti ou swa an totalite dan lane fiskal, ranpli valer ki ou finn paye, pa ou anplwayer. Vizit sit web MRA (reveni non taksab ek soulazman, dediksion & alokasion) pou plis informasion.

monthlyBaseSalary.label: Saler debaz mansyel (pou 1 mwa)
monthlyBaseSalary.description: Saler debaz mansyel pou enn mwa travay konplet.

totalBaseSalary.label: Saler debaz total (12 mwa)
totalBaseSalary.description: Kalkil montan total saler debaz pou lane fiskal.

eoyBonus.label: Bonis EOY
eoyBonus.description: Nou osi apel sa bonis treziem mwa.

travelingAllowance.label: Konpansasion transpor
travelingAllowance.description: Kalkil montan total konpansasion transpor pou lane fiskal.

performanceBonus.label: Bonis performans
performanceBonus.description: Kalkil montan total bonis performans pou lane fiskal.

otherTaxableIncome.label: Lezot konpansasion taksab
otherTaxableIncome.description: Kalkil montan total bann lezot konpansasion taksab pou lane fiskal.

otherTaxDeductions.label: Dediksion taks
otherTaxDeductions.description: Kalkil montan total bann dediksion taks pou lane fiskal.

isPublicSector.label: Eski ou travay dan sekter piblik?

paye.subtitle: PAYE (Innkom taks) faktire par MRA (sif arondi)
paye.calculationDescription: Kalkil taks PAYE: Lor sak ranze,
paye.calculationSteps:
• Si reveni taksab restan pli tigit ki limit taksab, reveni taksab restan servi kouma montan taksab
  • sinon, limit taksab servi kouma montan taksab ek nou retir limit taksab depi dan reveni taksab restan pou prosin kalkil

nsf.subtitle: NSF (sif arondi) faktire par MRA
nsf.nsfInsurableSalaryExplanation: NSF kalkile lor saler debaz. Selman, zis enn parti saler debaz servi dan kalkil la, i.e. <Link>enn minimum ek enn maximum fixe par MRA</Link> (paz 9).
